attributes.action: set an example to the World by subsidizing all homes in the UK with funds to buy solar panels and wind turbines.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why not do something positive towards tackling climate change? Why not create something that the citizens of the UK can be proud of? Why not give a unified reason to be proud of our Government and back a Prime Minister who has set a positive example to the rest of the World?  Wouldn't it be fascinating to watch our children see the demise of fossil fuel and learn about how harnessing nature is a very good alternative?  Why not make this simple idea a reality to mark a step in the right direction towards The Green Revolution?
